1.title: Jeremiah's Call
1.keyEvent: God calls Jeremiah to be a prophet

2.title: Israel's Unfaithfulness
2.keyEvent: God rebukes Israel's idolatry and apostasy

3.title: Call to Repentance
3.keyEvent: God invites Israel to return to Him

4.title: Judgment Approaches
4.keyEvent: Warning of coming destruction for Judah

7.title: Temple Sermon
7.keyEvent: God condemns false trust in the temple

8.title: Judah's Sin and Sorrow
8.keyEvent: People refuse to repent despite warnings

11.title: Covenant Broken
11.keyEvent: Judah breaks God's covenant; plot against Jeremiah

13.title: Linen Belt Symbol
13.keyEvent: Jeremiah uses belt to symbolize Israel's pride

14.title: Drought and Prayer
14.keyEvent: Famine and drought; Jeremiah prays for mercy

15.title: Judgment Pronounced
15.keyEvent: God declares judgment and offers hope

16.title: No Marriage or Mourning
16.keyEvent: Jeremiah instructed to avoid normal life events

17.title: Trust in God
17.keyEvent: Blessings for trusting God; curses for sin

18.title: Potter's House
18.keyEvent: God likened to potter shaping Israel

19.title: Broken Jar Symbol
19.keyEvent: Jeremiah breaks jar symbolizing Jerusalem's destruction

20.title: Jeremiah's Persecution
20.keyEvent: Prophet suffers for proclaiming God's word

21.title: Judah's Doom
21.keyEvent: God sends message of judgment to Zedekiah

22.title: Kings Rebuked
22.keyEvent: God condemns unjust kings of Judah

23.title: False Prophets Condemned
23.keyEvent: God promises righteous Branch and judges falsehood

24.title: Figs Symbolism
24.keyEvent: Good and bad figs represent Judah's fate

26.title: Jeremiah's Trial
26.keyEvent: Prophet threatened for condemning temple worship

28.title: Hananiah's False Prophecy
28.keyEvent: False prophet opposes Jeremiah and dies

29.title: Letter to Exiles
29.keyEvent: Jeremiah encourages exiles to seek welfare

30.title: Restoration Promised
30.keyEvent: God promises to restore Israel and Judah

31.title: New Covenant
31.keyEvent: God promises a new covenant with Israel

32.title: Jeremiah Buys Field
32.keyEvent: Symbolic purchase of land during siege

34.title: Judah's Broken Promise
34.keyEvent: Judah breaks covenant of freeing slaves

42.title: Prophecy to Remnant
42.keyEvent: Jeremiah advises remnant to trust God

43.title: Refusal to Obey
43.keyEvent: People disobey Jeremiah and flee to Egypt

48.title: Judgment on Moab
48.keyEvent: Prophecy against Moab's pride and sin

49.title: Judgments on Nations
49.keyEvent: Prophecies against Ammon, Edom, Damascus, others

50.title: Judgment on Babylon
50.keyEvent: Prophecy of Babylon's fall and restoration

52.title: Fall of Jerusalem
52.keyEvent: Historical account of Jerusalem's fall and exile
